name: Ma'Shalled
aura: Increases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 34%.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 30% of the damage inflicted. 

Will then attack enemies under [Leech] debuffs.
skills.name: Bloodsucker
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%
Level 6: Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns. 

Places a [True Fear] and a [Leech] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.

Grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Tornado

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of stealing all buffs from the target before attacking. 

Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. 

Also places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on this Champion for 3 turns. 

Damage increases by 50% against targets that have no buffs.
skills.name: Open Wounds
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
